title: West Virginia - poverty rate from 2000 to 2018
summary: In general Percentage of population has stayed the same over the Year.
Percentage of population is roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 19.1 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Percentage of population about 17.8 was reached at Year 2012, and 2018
